gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve the current workflow transition rule configurations for my project to ensure they align with our process requirements.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all workflow transition rule configurations, including their IDs, names, and associated transitions.

gold.user: As a workflow administrator, I need to update the transition rule configurations to reflect the new approval process for issue transitions.
gold.ideal: The API should accept the updated configuration data and return a success message along with the updated configuration details.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I want to delete obsolete workflow transition rule configurations to maintain a clean and efficient workflow setup.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully remove the specified transition rule configurations and return a confirmation message indicating the deletion was successful.
